sentences.english: The bridge collapsed, so we had to wade across the river.
sentences.chinese: 因为桥梁倒塌，所以我们必须涉水过河。

sentences.english: Only a handful of bridges have major support beams made from them.
sentences.chinese: 只有少数桥梁采用纤维增强塑料的主体支撑梁。

sentences.english: Its structure function and its esthetics characteristic should be embodied.
sentences.chinese: 桥梁建筑首要满足其结构功能，还要体现其美学特性。

sentences.english: Long span cable-stayed bridge is one of the most important modem bridge types.
sentences.chinese: 大跨度斜拉桥是现代桥梁最具竞争力的桥型之一。

sentences.english: English is abridge to so much knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 英语是通向丰富知识的桥梁。

sentences.english: The control for wind-induced vibration of long-span bridges was studied in this thesis.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究大跨度桥梁风致振动控制。

sentences.english: The commonest form of bridge construction is the beam.
sentences.chinese: 梁是桥梁结构的最常见的一种形式。

sentences.english: This paper presents the load test of rhombus cradle.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了某桥梁菱形挂篮的荷载试验情况。

sentences.english: You may say you do not think that God intended a woman to be a bridge-builder.
sentences.chinese: 你或许以为，上帝并不想让妇女去建造桥梁。

sentences.english: That naughty little boy has grown into an outstanding bridge engineer.
sentences.chinese: 那个调皮的小男孩已成长为一名杰出的桥梁一程师。

sentences.english: Commando force joined up with the airborne troops near the captured bridge.
sentences.chinese: 突击队和空降部队在被占领的桥梁附近汇合。

sentences.english: This calculation method has been used in the design of high piers for multiple bridges.
sentences.chinese: 该计算方法已应用于多座桥梁的高墩设计。

sentences.english: A simple method to predict earthquake damage to railroad bridge is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种简单的预测铁路桥梁地震震害的方法。

sentences.english: Finally, according to chatter mechanism, analysis of occurrence of the Humen Bridge Flutter reasons .
sentences.chinese: 最后，从桥梁颤振机理分析虎门大桥发生颤振的原因。

sentences.english: Usually need to survey deformation of bridge pier in construction process.
sentences.chinese: 在桥梁施工过程中经常需要对桥梁墩台进行沉降观测。

sentences.english: Usually need to survey deformation of bridge pier in construction process.
sentences.chinese: 在桥梁施工过程中经常需要对桥梁墩台进行沉降观测。

definition: Da Qiao, one of the Two Qiaos, according to Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], the two great beauties of ancient China
to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
to span/to stretch across/to travel across
to build (esp. with simple materials)/to knock together (a temporary shed)/to rig up
